casebody.data:
PINE
v.
WAL-MART ASSOCIATES, INC. #1552, et al. 335A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 7, 2017 Ms. Holly M. Stott, Attorney at Law, Mr. M. Duane Jones, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Wal-Mart Associates, Inc. # 1552, et al. Mr. David A. Shelby, Attorney at Law, Salisbury, for Pine, Patricia.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 2nd of November 2017 by Defendants:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of November 2017."

Defendants shall have up to and including the 27th day of November 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
